inventory.log: Explore and learn about the Saku Monsters universe.
inventory.hint: No monsters found for filters applied

landing.download: Download Now, Hatch Eggs, Earn Rewards Today!

intro-card.title: Intro
intro-card.paragraph: Saku Monsters transforms the way we collect in Web3, drawing inspiration from classic '90s RPGs and toys to create a groundbreaking experience.

phase-one.p-phase: During Phase 1 of the Saku Monsters experience, over 70,000 users competed against each other to take care of a Saku Monster egg and earn Saku coins.
phase-one.p-blue: Download Now, Hatch Eggs, Earn Rewards Today!
phase-one.p-green: Your egg needs love and attention on a daily basis, so make sure you take good care of it.
phase-one.p-orange: Each Saku Monster has its own unique traits, abilities, and personality.

grow-card.shop-paragraph: Visit the Saku Monsters Web Shop to add Gems to your account. You can use Gems to buy Saku Monsters on the Mobile App!
grow-card.grow-paragraph: Collect Saku Monsters by hatching them from Saku Monster eggs! There are 150 unique Gen 1 monsters to discover, each with their own characteristics and abilities. Visit the Sakulog to discover each monster and it's phases.
grow-card.collect-paragraph: There are many Saku Monsters to collect! As we expand the Sakuverse, more and more Saku Monsters will appear with many more fun things to do!

phase-two.title: Visit the SakuLog
phase-two.discover: Explore and learn about the saku monster universe!

phase-three.island-paragraph:
With Phase 3 comes our long-awaited token, $SAKU! We are dedicated to delivering a seamless and engaging experience with the integration of $SAKU, ensuring it's well worth the anticipation.

 There will be many innovative and gun ways to use $SAKU, from designing your Island to hunting for exclusive Monsters!
phase-three.saku-paragraph:
In the initial two phases, early users have been accumulating coins, setting the stage for the $SAKU airdrop.

 This preparation highlights $SAKU's pivotal role in our ecosystem, enhancing user engagement and offering fun experiences in the future.

1.title: Egg Tap Competition
1.description: Saku Monsters started with our Egg Tap Competition! Users earned coins as they practiced taking car of a Saku Monsters egg.

2.title: Collecting Journey
2.description: Everyone continue their Journey by beginning to collect the first ever Saku Monsters, while earning more coins!

footer.place: A PLACE FOR FRIENDSHIP AND DISCOVERY
